data.text: @EU_Commission @MartinSelmayr @Europarl_EN You're doing it wrong
@EU_Commission I know many Greeks and Greek Cypriots, they all, to a man and woman despise the EU αντιο σας
@EU_Commission @LawTop20 Happy Independence Day To Greece
@EU_Commission Thanks for this, but how about stop arming Turkish aggression against this peaceful land? that would be a start :-)

@EU_Commission @MartinSelmayr @Europarl_EN Sure, if someone offered me tons of money, and a car I'm pretty sure I'd bend the rules and call something 'legal' as well. Your day will come. At some point, all these docile, obedient citizens will have had enough. We see you.

@EU_Commission I remember Greece when it was a proud but poor nation, the elderly were well looked after in old age and the country was unified if somewhat badly run. 30 years in the EU and it's a horror show.
@EU_Commission You are the enemy of the people.
@EU_Commission ΕΣΕΙΣ ΕΙΣΤΕ ΕΥΡΩ-ΠΕΟΙ ΕΜΕΙΣ ΕΙΜΑΣΤΕ ΕΛΛΗΝΕΣ

@EU_Commission @EuropeanCentral @ecb Cooked the Books for #Greece to enter, #German Banks recklessly lent, On Fall of #LehmanBrothers @Barclays Removed Greek Government and created a humanitarian crises funding civil servants wages/mortgages to carry it out like #Ireland. Happy go Fcuk yourself
@EU_Commission, @marianorajoy & @GobiernoDeEspan they have dynamited the foundations on which the European Union was built; THE DEMOCRACY.
@EU_Commission You've never been connected in the first place !

@EU_Commission Thanks for this! Appreciated.
It's time to do more for Greece and every other EU member but also for the fragile idea of a United Europe. It's an idea that can help peace and prosperity for the whole world. It's needed more than ever, but it has to have a meaning for the people.
@EU_Commission @BosseStine The question is wrong. EU needs to reconnect with the people - not the other way around!
@EU_Commission Simply.....Greece!! The Greekroman civilazation along with Christianity laid the foundations of what contempraries call West or Western civilazation!!
@EU_Commission @MartinSelmayr @Europarl_EN Yeah. And the EU did enough to curb the greed of banks. And lobbying of powerful multinationals is not a problem. And Santa is real.
@EU_Commission @MartinSelmayr @Europarl_EN And you wonder why people hate the EU...

@EU_Commission @MartinSelmayr @Europarl_EN Another one in the Pegasus series of the commission, so apt to arouse the complete dismay of their constituency (well, by proxy) to the point of a full range of Brexit, Nexit, Bexit, Frexit, Dexits etc. until the whole bunch comes crumbling down.
@EU_Commission Is this some perverse trolling?

@EU_Commission c'est l'heure de la verité. Ou bien vous rejetez l'autoritarisme espagnol, ou bien vous permetez la derive turque et russe de l'Espagne, dédans l'Union. En ce cas, les valeurs européens seron finis. La crise politique suivra à l'économique.
@EU_Commission @MartinSelmayr @Europarl_EN Because if something is in full compliance with all legal rules, it cannot be a historical mistake

@EU_Commission @MartinSelmayr @Europarl_EN You're lucky that 99% of your corruption is not covered by the left liberal media you paid. But at a certain moment that whole load of shit will come to your head in one fell swoop. I hope that moment will be the elections next year.

This eu is broken, we need a new one!

@EU_Commission #EUhack #EUandME #OMR18

That is basic human right

To be what you are

And you are blind over that

@EU_Commission @MartinSelmayr @Europarl_EN These people should be ashamed of themselves! There are no more than card players that cheat within the rulues. Can’t you see how ridiculous is x a Commission to be ‘ unanimous ‘ when you have only 1 candidate? Shame on your little circle of friends 🤡
